entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Introduce way for route handler delegates (Minimal APIs) to return union results (i.e. multiple `IResult` types) #40672
  • [Razor] CSS Isolation not working when special characters in project name #40668
  • Localized metadata for template is not localized templatestrings.{lang}.json #40666
  • Runtime razor compilation fails - cannot find HttpContext extension methods #40665
  • Quarantine ReadAsync_WithAllowInputFormatterExceptionMessages_RegistersJsonInputExceptionsAsInputFormatterException #40661
  • @bind and @bind-Value and @bind-Value for extra model behave different for datetime #40660
  • React SignalR - customHeader #40659
  • RAM problems when downloading files #40658
  • Make IResult concrete types public #40656
    7.0-preview3
  • Add perf test for endpoint filter vs. no endpoint filter #40655
    7.0-preview3
  • Runtime & EFCore Dependencies Out of Date #40653

Closed

  • RE-open: Blazor redirect to cshtml not work with renderMode = Server #39391
    Discussions
  • Add a code analyzer to ensure that razor pages that define Dispose actually implement IDisposable #40638
  • Enable packages for Mariner 2.0 #40253
  • Enable build of Linux Arm64 RPM packages #40252
  • Blazor Server App fails to restart when restarted by IIS #40595
    6.0.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Support tab characters in headers and unify validation code between servers. #40671
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
  • Add architecture to targeting pack archives #40669
    area-infrastructure
  • Add support for route handler filter factories #40667
    area-web-frameworks
  • Update CODEOWNERS #40664
    area-infrastructure
  • Quarantining ReadAsync_WithAllowInputFormatterExceptionMessages_RegistersJsonInputExceptionsAsInputFormatterException #40662
    area-mvc
  • Revert "Arm64 installers Take 2 (#40562)" #40651
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Add the PublishArgs back #40670
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • [release/6.0] Build .rpm packages for linux arm64 #40504
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.4
  • [release/5.0] Remove unintentional space in LazIntermediateToken.cs file name #40474
    area-mvc, tell-mode, 5.0.16
  • [release/3.1] Update a few more components #40605
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.24
  • [Blazor] Fix race condition when caching for a type of QueryParameterValueSupplier (#40636) #40663
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.4
  • Build .rpm packages for linux arm64 #40485
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Fix race condition when caching for a type of QueryParameterValueSupplier #40636
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3
  • Fix installer build #40657
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Fix denial of service in ASP.NET Core via FormPipeReader #40648
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Support tab characters in headers and unify validation code between servers #40633
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Write fields directive to streamwriter #39900
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update HttpContextAccessor.cs #40578
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Remove downlevel runtimes from global.json #40393
    area-infrastructure
  • [Do not merge] Publish some installer artifacts for testing #40647
    area-infrastructure
  • Add gRPC JSON transcoding #40242
    area-grpc
  • feat : Add `StringSyntax` for regex parameters #40589
    area-mvc, community-contribution
